titles.title: A resolution to authorize the President of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Fred Thompson of Tennessee.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 12/1/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the President of the Senate to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Fred Thompson of Tennessee on December 9, 1994.
